snippet.title: Ultraman Fighting Evolution 0 - PSP Gameplay 1080p (PPSSPP)
snippet.description:
Ultraman Fighting Evolution 0 - PSP Gameplay 1080p (PPSSPP)

Visit us at http://www.godgames-world.com for more

Ultraman Fighting Evolution 0 (ウルトラマン Fighting Evolution 0?) is a Fighting game based on the Japanese super hero Ultraman.

Playable Ultramen
Ultraman: Patrols space after the story.
Zoffy:
Ultra Seven:
Ultraman Jack:
Ultraman Ace:
Ultraman Taro:
Ultraman Leo:
Ultraman Mebius: Has to grasp his true potential after his attacks fail him against the Choju Vakishim
Father of Ultra:

Playable monsters and aliens
Alien Baltan
Zetton
Eleking
Black King
Vakishim
Alien Hipporit
Alien Temperor
Alien Babalou

Trivia
Although the character Black King is considered new to the Ultraman Fighting series, the model of the character is actually the same model that was used for the game entitled "Ultraman" for the PS2.
Alien Nackle was originally going to be a playble character and have the same model used from the game "Ultraman" for the PS2, but he was cut.
In the gas tank stage, you can see in the tank that it had a Kemular sign.
in the Nebula M78 stage you can clearly see the Ultraman King statue.



Enhanced graphics with emulator PPSSPP.For recording I used a Nvidia Shadowplay (it can handle 1080p at 60FPS).
-some games can have graphical issues, lags and other problems...



PC specs:
CPU - Intel Core i7 3770K @ 4.20 Ghz
RAM - 8 GB
GPU - MSI GeForce GTX 760 OC Gaming
OS  - Windows 7 64bit



PPSSPP v 1.0.1
- try yourself

Automated builds to download:
buildbot.orphis.net/ppsspp/



::::: Rate, Comment & Subscribe :::::
